column6: Condo is FRONT row with an amazing view- walking distance to so much! High end EVERYTHING- Ninja blender, KitchenAid mixer, Keurig, plush towels, 4K UltraHD TV's & more. Centrally located- convenient to downtown, restaurants, NO drive to beach... simply walk across the street! 1 of 2 pools heated! BBQ pits on site.\n\nTax already included in pricing.
column9: Truly FRONT ROW Ocean View! A Stay Above the Rest!
